title.narrative: Access restored for emergency response and clean-up activities
% of relocated houses with improved transport access to social/educational/commercial opportunities
Feasible route identified and road designed
Quarterly progress reports against work plan and budget
Before and after study of relocated communities
Samusu - Lalomanu link road constructed (around 5 km)
Feasible pedestrian links identified and designed
Restored seawalls and road access to communities affected by the September 29, 2009 tsunami.
Improved pedestrian access to relocation areas.
20 km of existing access roads upgraded and sealed.
10 km of Lepa - Lalomanu link road upgraded and sealed.
